title: 3D194 Brick Breaker
tagline: A brick breaking game with a twist
description: Huge levels, crazy powerups, and an economy system. Break bricks, earn cash, buy weapons of mass brick destruction. Referenced in upcoming articles on economics.

sections.content: A brick breaking game that starts simple and gets out of hand. Huge procedural levels, a cash economy, and powerups that escalate from sensible to absurd.

content: Massive Levels: Not your usual 5 rows of bricks. These levels fight back.
Cash Economy: Earn money by breaking bricks. Spend it on powerups mid-game.
Multiball, Bombs, Rockets, Fungicide: The powerup names alone should tell you this isn't a normal breakout clone.
Mobile Friendly: Tap to launch, drag to aim. Works great on phones.

sections.content: This game will be referenced in upcoming articles on economics. Play it now so you're not confused later.
